description:
Dazai decides to make oden on a cold, cold winter day, but there’s only one problem: he doesn’t know how to make oden.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Oden with the White Tiger / Elevator Panic / The Armed Detective Agency Beats the Heat
Shiroi Tora to Oden o / Elevator Panic / Busou Tanteisha Nouryou o Suru
白い虎とおでんを / エレベーターパニック / 武装探偵社納涼をする
